data.eml:eml: Revision of the Magellanic Mactridae Lamarck, 1809 (Bivalvia: Heterodonta)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Signorelli, Javier H., Pastorino, Guido (2011): Revision of the Magellanic Mactridae Lamarck, 1809 (Bivalvia: Heterodonta). Zootaxa 2757: 47-67, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.201077
